description: Sum [LCM(k, n/k)], where sum is over positive integers k that divide n.
comments: Multiplicative with a(p) = 2*p, a(p^k) = (2*p^(k+1) - p^ceiling[(k+1)/2] - p^floor[(k+1)/2]) / (p-1). a(n) is odd iff n is an odd square. - _Henry Bottomley_, May 16 2005Multiplicative with a(p^e) = sum p^max(k, e-k), k=0..e (Cf. A107661). - _Mitch Harris_, May 18 2005
links: L. TÃ³th, Multiplicative arithmetic functions of several variables: a survey, arXiv preprint arXiv:1310.7053, 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, lcm(d, n/d)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 19 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_, Oct 18 2000
